TI: [Conditioned reflex dopamine release in the nucleus accumbens in rats with disrupted hippocampal formation].
AB: Lesion of the hippocampal formation affects in different ways the dopamine release in response to the two phases of emotional conditioning: increases the acquisition and exerts no effect on the expression of the reflex in rats.
AD: Pavlov Institute of Physiology, Russian Acad. Sci., 199034, St. Petersburg, Nab. Makarova, 6, Russia.
TT: Uslovnoreflektornyi vybros dofamina v prilezhashchem iadre posle razrusheniia gippokampal'noi formatsii u krys.
TA: Ross Fiziol Zh Im I M Sechenova
JT: Rossiiskii fiziologicheskii zhurnal imeni I.M. Sechenova
SO: Ross Fiziol Zh Im I M Sechenova. 1997 Jan-Feb;83(1-2):76-82.
